title: London Family's Escape on the Lake
text:
London Family's Escape on the Lake 8/6/2015 10:00AM London-based architects Rachel and Manuel Nogueira recently designed a getaway home in the Cotswolds. The home, which they visit with their twin boys, has sweeping lake views. Photo: Dylan Thomas for The Wall Street Journal Transcript
